biotools.summary: A plasmid Editor (ApE) is a free, multi-platform application for visualizing, designing, and presenting biologically relevant DNA sequences. ApE provides a flexible framework for annotating a sequence manually or using a user-defined library of features. ApE can be used in designing plasmids and other constructs via in silico simulation of cloning methods such as PCR, Gibson assembly, restriction-ligation assembly and Golden Gate assembly.
